data.Name: Christone "Kingfish" Ingram
data.Bio: Christone "Kingfish" Ingram (born January 19, 1999) is an American blues guitarist and singer from Clarksdale, MS. Ingram’s love of music grew from the Gospel sounds emanating from his family’s church and the Blues music he regularly heard played in his Delta neighborhood. A cousin to legendary Country music great Charlie Pride, he was trained at the Delta Blues Museum under the tutelage of Daddy Rich and Bill Howl-N-Madd Perry. At age of 6, Kingfish began playing the drums. Read more on Last.fm
